Terms & Conditions

1 night deposit is required at the time of booking. All deposits are non-refundable. Full payment taken 14 days before arrival. If cancelled up to 14 days prior to arrival, 1st night deposit will be lost. If cancelled up to 7 days prior to arrival, 50% of the total cost of the booking will be refunded. If cancelled within 7 days prior to arrival full payment will be forfeit.
